question: The CSIR Floriculture Mission was given approval for implementation across how many states/UTs of India?
explanation:
The Union Science and Technology Minister has launched the CSIR Floriculture Mission, which was approved t be implemented across 21 states/UTs.
The Science and Technology Minister Harsh Vardhan, has asked the scientists of CSIR laboratories in India to develop land available at each laboratory to set up as a model under the “CSIR Floriculture Mission”.
